subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Doping (Sports)
Olympic Games (2012)
lead_paragraph: Levi Leipheimer and three other top U.S. cyclists asked that they be taken out of the running for places on the road cycling team for the Olympic Games, USA Cycling announced in a brief statement Saturday.
snippet: Levi Leipheimer and three other top U.S. cyclists asked that they be taken out of the running for places on the road cycling team for the Olympic Games, USA Cycling announced in a brief statement Saturday.
